sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Software for lattice light-sheet imaging of FRET biosensors, illustrated with a new Rap1 biosensor. O'Shaughnessy EC, Stone OJ, LaFosse PK, Azoitei ML, Tsygankov D, Heddleston JM, Legant WR, Wittchen ES, Burridge K, Elston TC, Betzig E, Chew TL, Adalsteinsson D, Hahn KM. J Cell Biol. 2019 Sep 2;218(9):3153-3160. doi: 10.1083/jcb.201903019. Epub 2019 Aug 23. 10.1083/jcb.201903019 PubMed 31444239

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: p10 promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: baculovirus promoter for expression in insect cells
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: p10 promoter

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pCAGGS-5
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Chimeric intron in CAG promoter, forward primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pCAGGS-5

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CMV enhancer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: human cytomegalovirus immediate early enhancer

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: loxP
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: loxP
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GCATACAT).

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Amp-R

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: FLAG(R) epitope tag, followed by an enterokinase cleavage site

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: contains part of ORF1629

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: P2A
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: P2A
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Eukaryotic ribosomes fail to insert a peptide bond between the Gly and Pro residues, yielding separate polypeptides.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR
